name: NPS - Net Promoter Score
description: Net Promoter Score is a customer loyalty metric, used to gauge the loyalty of a firm's customer relationships. It serves as an alternative to traditional customer satisfaction research and claims to be correlated with revenue growth.

questions.label: How likely is it that you would recommend our product to a friend or colleague?
What is the main reason for your score?

name: Simple Feedback Form
description: A basic feedback form, with a singe text field to gather open feedback.

questions.label: Let us know what you think about our product

name: Customer Satisfaction Survey
description: Gather customer satisfaction score together with a follow up question to gather open feedback.

questions.label: How satisfied are you with our product?
What is the main reason for your score?
